title: 为什么跳舞树长这个模组用了数长不了
author: 哈哈33
txt_content: 为什么跳舞树长这个模组用了树长不了，也没有粒子效果，求解

replies.txt_content:
解决方法:
1.检查mod是否与版本对应
2.是否加了forge（检查forge版本是否兼容）
3.是否与其他mod（插件）有冲突
实在不行把日志发过来看看

replies.author: youyihj
replies.txt_content:
请修改配置文件，默认的的确有些慢
打开treegrowingsimulator.cfg，把waitTime的值改成10，即可
# Configuration file

tweaks {
    # Will spawn a LOT more particles for actions near saplings.
    B:allTheParticles=false

    # Energy (in RF) that is gotten each time the engine is "bumped," meaning every time you crouch or sprint
    I:energyPerBump=25

    # Show bonemeal particles when appropriate. Not sure why you would turn this off, but eh
    B:showParticles=true

    # The amount of ticks (times 5) you must be crouching or sprinting before bonemeal is applied
    I:waitTime=500
}

复制代码

replies.author: playymcmc007
replies.txt_content: 首先你不要轻易放弃，试试站在树苗中央，用自己的手速疯狂按潜行，如果10秒后还是无反应，可以去官网翻下最新版本替换掉原来的
